DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine safety efficacy pulsatile GnRH deliver iontophoretic patch ( Lutrepatch ) induction ovulation woman anovulatory/ oligoovulatory infertility , compare placebo reference treatment clomiphene citrate .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Efficacy Safety Three Dosage Strengths Pulsatile GnRH Delivered From Iontophoretic Patch Compared Oral Treatment With Clomiphene Placebo Infertile Females
DOC.criteria: 1 . Females age 18 38 year 2 . Desire become pregnant 3 . Infertile due ovulatory dysfunction describe : Unable conceive least 1 year Anovulatory ( define 4 few menstrual cycle per year ) Oligoovulatory ( define menstrual cycle frequency > 45 day ) 1 . Requires donor oocyte sperm 2 . Two fail ( defined biochemical pregnancy achieve ) gonadotropin fertility treatment cycle previous gonadotropin success , two fail subsequent cycle 3 . Use insulinsensitizing drug ( e.g. , Metformin ) within 1 month prior progesterone challenge
